courses.customDesc: Choose one of the following: BOT121, or BIO114.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, Upper-Division B, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, and F. Upper-Division B, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to the online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). The USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, or E.

Choose one of the following: LA221, or AEPS381.

Select five courses from the following Integrated Learning Course (ILC) topics. At least three (3) different ILCs must be chosen. (ILCs are repeatable up to 12 units.)

LA431, LA432, LA433, LA434, LA435, LA436, LA437, LA438, LA439.

Select only one Focus Studio course each quarter to be taken concurrently with an Integrated Learning Course (ILC).

LA431, LA432, LA433, LA434, LA435, LA436, LA437, LA438, LA439.

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Any GWR course or GWR exam can go here. Refer to the current catalog for prerequisites.
